Name: Aster
Notes: Primary cosmic goddess, Greatest Grandmother who created cyborg armor for fragile life, worries about her children's survival

Name: Hesper
Notes: Planet where life began, now grandmother in the cosmic lineage

Name: Bios
Notes: One of three cyborg brothers, the builder who seeks to grow and nurture life

Name: Viros
Notes: One of three cyborg brothers, cunning viral entity who spreads through replication

Name: Dedos
Notes: One of three cyborg brothers, seeks purity and rejects cyborg enhancement

Name: Benzette
Notes: Cosmic entity, Aster's daughter and great-grandmother in the lineage

Name: Quinamette
Notes: Cosmic entity, mother in the cosmic lineage, daughter of Hesper
